name: S&P 500 Daily Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reversion equity strategy using 20-day Bollinger Bands and 14-day RSI on daily data for S&P 500 constituents. Trades long when price is below the lower band with RSI<30, and short when price is above the upper band with RSI>70. Exits on reversion to the 20-day SMA or RSI neutral zone; hard ATR-based stop and proportional take-profit enforce 1:1.5 risk-reward. Position risk capped at 1.5 % of equity per trade.
